divs: Sighting Details2 witnesses saw an object very high in the sky traveling very fast from south to north. The object made no sound and displayed a light cycle of gradual illumination (the entire object was glowing white when illuminated) for about 3 seconds and then a gradual fade to complete black for exactly 5 seconds. Sighting time was just a little over a minute or so, but it's the second one I've seen like this since July. The object made no sound and flashed this time, but only once during the whole sighting.
Summary: Silent UFO displaying continuous light cycle of 3 seconds of illumination followed by 5 seconds of blackout
